application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
description: 1 x Prunus (applicants ref. T1) - Approximately 5.50m: Thin crown density throughout by approximately 20%. Reduce over extended branches by up to approximately 1.50m. Remove dead wood throughout crown. General maintenance.1 x Small Apple (applicants ref. T2) - Approximately 3.00m: Lightly reduce by 0.50m.  Remove dead wood. General maintenance.1 x  Apple (applicants ref. T3) - Approximately 4.00m: Reduce by up to approximately 1.20m, pruning back to suitable growth points producing a more compact crown structure. Thin crown density by 20%.1 x Mature Damson (applicants ref. T4) - Approximately 5.50m: Thin crown density by 20%.  Remove dead wood.  Reduce over long branches back into main crown structure, up to 1.20m. General maintenance.2 x Yucca/Palm-Cordyline (applicants ref. T5) - Approximately 4.00m: (left and right of the path): Reduce to a more uniform height. Remove dead leaves. General maintenance.
